docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Robert Austrian’s research led to a pneumococcal vaccine that has saved the lives of hundreds of thousands of people.

headline.main: Robert Austrian, 90, Dies; Developed Major Vaccine
headline.print_headline: Robert Austrian, 90, Dies; Developed Major Vaccine

docs.snippet: Dr. Robert Austrian’s research led to a pneumococcal vaccine that has saved the lives of hundreds of thousands of people.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some doctors and researchers say that in a few years the use of stem cells could grow new knee ligaments or elbow tendons, creating a therapy that becomes the vanguard of sports injury repair.

headline.main: For Athletes, the Next Fountain of Youth?
headline.sub: With Stem Cell Technology Advancing, Preparing for Therapeutic  Possibilities   ;
headline.print_headline: For Athletes, The Next Fountain Of Youth?

docs.snippet: Some doctors and researchers say that in a few years the use of stem cells could grow new knee ligaments or elbow tendons, creating a therapy that becomes the vanguard of sports injury repair.
